title: The matte plastic coating on Pixel 5 wearing down
content:
I've had my P5 (sorta sage) for about a week now and noticed that the bottom corners of the phone are starting to become shinier, like anything plastic (e.g keyboard turning glossy after years of use). Is this just a fact having a plastic coating on my phone or is this a QC issue? 

And yes I do tend to keep my phone fully naked.
